mapper.insert: insert into admin_table(admin_id, admin_password, admin_name, admin_phone1, admin_phone2, admin_phone3, admin_email, admin_academy, admin_tier, admin_date) values(#{admin_id}, hex(aes_encrypt(#{admin_password}, SHA2('bockgi541354',256))), #{admin_name}, #{admin_phone1}, #{admin_phone2}, #{admin_phone3}, #{admin_email}, #{admin_academy}, 0, now());
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM admin_table where admin_id = #{admin_id} and CONVERT(AES_DECRYPT(unhex(admin_password), SHA2('bockgi541354',256)) USING utf8) = #{admin_password};
